|stockos = |exp_if_types = |exp_sim_num = |exp_pcmcia_num = |exp_expcard_num = |exp_minipci_num = |exp_minipcie_num = |exp_usb_num = |exp_cf_num = |exp_sdmmc_num = |exp_ide_num = |exp_ata_num = |exp_sata_num = |exp_esata_num = |exp_parallel = |exp_sfp_num = |exp_M.2 = |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 1 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |serial = yes |jtag = yes |specialfeat = |flags = |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = bgn |defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |is_manuf = |tpfirmware = OpenWrt, DD-WRT |availability = Discontinued |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 05/30/2008 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China |buttons = |led = |dimensions = |weight = |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1chip2 = Atheros;AR9102; |rad1oui = |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL, RP-SMA, 5dBi Detachable Omni Directional Antenna X 2 |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4-2.4835 }}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== The power adapter included with the device is a '''Leader Electronics''' MU12-2120100-C5 (12V, 1A). ==Links of Interest== {{Dead link|https://picasaweb.google.com/etthtech/TPLinkTLWR841NDVer30PL|Pictures}} [http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=74112 TP-LINK TL-WR841N - DD-WRT forums]
[http://www.dd-wrt.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=73852 TP-Link TL-WR841ND Ver 3.0 - DD-WRT forums] [http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr841nd On the OpenWrt wiki]
[https://forum.openwrt.org/viewtopic.php?id=21425 HOWTO: Install Openwrt on TP-Link TL-WR841ND VERSION 3 - OpenWrt forums] ==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing dd-wrt=== Supported by dd-wrt as of = v.24 sp2 - build 14589 - 20100611 :[https://forum.dd-wrt.com/wiki/index.php/TP-LINK_TL-WR841ND On the '''DD-WRT''' Wiki] Please insert instructions here ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/tp-link/tp-link_tl-wr841nd_v3 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr841nd |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = |subtarget = |arch = |support_started_version = 10.03 |current_supported_version = 18.06.9 |comment = }} Please insert instructions here ==Pictures==
